title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Historic Partnership Elevates Assamese Language in AI Database
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment ... [502 chars]

title: Historic Partnership Elevates Assamese Language in AI Database
description: A collaboration between two Guwahati NGOs and IIT Bombay's BharatGen AI initiative aims to elevate the Assamese language in artificial intelligence databases. This partnership, part of the 'Digitising Assam' project, incorporates two million Assamese language pages into BharatGen, significantly advancing AI readiness for this low-resource language.
content:
In a landmark move, two Guwahati-based NGOs have teamed up with IIT Bombay's BharatGen AI initiative to incorporate the Assamese language into the artificial intelligence database, according to an official announcement on Wednesday.
The organizations... [618 chars]

title: RBA Staff ‘Feeling the Weight’ of AI, Tech Shift, Governor Says
description: Reserve Bank of Australia staff are “feeling the weight” of its technological transformation agenda, Governor Michele Bullock said, adding that the use of big data and artificial intelligence has the potential to transform policy making.
content:
Reserve Bank of Australia staff are “feeling the weight” of its technological transformation agenda, Governor Michele Bullock said, adding that the use of big data and artificial intelligence has the potential to transform policy making.

title: AI chatbots changing online threat landscape as Ottawa reviews legislation
description: OTTAWA — Wrongful death lawsuits citing the activities of artificial intelligence chatbots are underway in the United States, as reports emerge of mental health issues and delusions induced by AI systems.
